short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds ChatGPT to Google / Bing / DDG / Baidu.com, and all the popular online translators such as DeepL!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatic ChatGPT integration into Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, and DeepL!
Just log into ChatGPT on chat.openai.com and you can then use it anywhere!
